translation.en: Do you know where we are?
I'm having a hard time remembering.
This is so weird. No wallet, no ID.
translation.es: Es muy raro.Ni billetera ni identificación...

translation.en: I mean, there's nothing on me besides this shell that I woke up holding.
translation.es: Cuando desperté, solo teníaesta concha de mar en la mano.

translation.en: I found it next to me on the beach.
translation.es: Lo encontré junto a mí en la arena.

translation.en: It's a lot more useful than this shell.
translation.es: Es mucho más útil que esto.

translation.en: So, we don't know who or where we are.
translation.es: Entonces, no sabemosquiénes somos ni dónde estamos.

translation.en: Listen, okay? I'll put this shell down.
Why don't you put the knife down, okay? You clearly don't know how to hold one.
translation.es: ¿Por qué no sueltas el cuchillo?Claramente, no sabes sostenerlo.

translation.en: How would you know a thing like that, huh?
Give the knife back to me.
We have company. We shouldn't be waving--
Around the corner, there are others.
-[man 1] Okay, let's rest. -[woman 2] Yeah, that's good.
All right, just take a little sip for now.
-Those things don't have that much milk. -Thanks.
Nobody can remember anything at all about how we woke up here?
translation.es: ¿Nadie recuerda nadade cómo nos despertamos aquí?

translation.en: It's not possible that we all have amnesia.
Okay, well, we may be on, I don't know, some kind of work trip or something?
translation.es: Tal vez estemos en algún tipode viaje de trabajo o algo así,

translation.en: Since our clothes are all so similar.
translation.es: como tenemos todos la misma ropa...

translation.en: I don't think this is team building.
translation.es: No creo que sea algo de trabajo en equipo.

translation.en: Then, what? I mean, our plane went down?
translation.es: Entonces, ¿qué? ¿Se cayó nuestro avión?¿Hubo un naufragio?
¿Se cayó nuestro avión?¿Hubo un naufragio? Piénsenlo.

translation.en: Ten people walk away from something like that without any injuries?
translation.es: ¿Diez personas saldrían de algo asícompletamente ilesas?

translation.en: There's no floating luggage around anywhere out in the water.
translation.es: No hay equipajes flotando en el agua.

translation.en: -There's no dead bodies. -Dead bodies don't float...
translation.es: - No hay cadáveres...- Los cadáveres no flotan...

translation.en: All I'm saying is, it doesn't add up.
translation.es: Solo digo que no tiene sentido.
- Por eso digo...- ¿Que no tiene sentido?

translation.en: Say it again. Doesn't add up.
translation.es: Dilo otra vez. No tiene sentido.

translation.en: Makes you feel better? Doesn't add up.
translation.es: ¿Te hace sentir mejor? No tiene sentido.

translation.en: Can I see something on your shirt?
No. I just want to check out your tag.

translation.es: Déjame ver. Dice "K. C.". K. C.

translation.en: Come on, all of us wearing the same tag? Same label?
translation.es: Vamos, ¿y todas las etiquetas son iguales?

translation.en: My name's Cooper. I don't remember that at all.
translation.es: Me llamo Cooper.No lo recuerdo para nada.

translation.en: -[Moses] What's your name? -[chuckling] Mine's, um, Blair.
translation.es: - ¿Cómo te llamas?- Mi nombre es Blair.

translation.en: So, do any of you guys want to head out with me?

translation.es: ¿Adónde? No lo sé, solo quiero entender esto.

translation.en: I just want to figure this thing out.
translation.es: No lo sé, solo quiero entender esto.

translation.en: Where we are, who we are? You know, little details like that.
translation.es: Dónde estamos, quiénes somos...Ya sabes, detalles insignificantes.

translation.en: Maybe we just learned our names.
Maybe you did figure out our names.
Good for you. But I already have one picked out for you.
translation.es: bien por ti. Pero ya tengo otro para ti.

translation.en: I'm sure it's the same one I've got for you.
translation.es: Debe ser el mismo que pensé para ti.

translation.en: I'll come with you. See what's what.
translation.es: Iré contigo a ver qué hay.

translation.en: Well, I guess I'll see you guys later.
[Donovan] We found something in every spot where someone was lying.
Yeah. Thank God we came when we did.
translation.es: Sí. Por suerte despertamos a tiempo,antes de que subiera la marea.

translation.en: A little bit longer, that tide would've came in.
translation.es: Por suerte despertamos a tiempo,antes de que subiera la marea.

translation.en: -[Donovan] This is not a coincidence. -Tell me about it.
translation.es: No es casualidad. Ni que lo digas.

translation.en: What are we even doing out here?
Maybe we're dead and this is heaven.
translation.es: Tal vez morimos y esto es el cielo.

translation.en: Time for the gun show. What a surprise.
translation.es: Hora de mostrar los músculos,qué sorpresa.

translation.en: find some fresh water and shelter.
translation.es: ...buscar agua para beber y un refugio.

translation.en: You know, actually, I don't think I can deal with that other chick again.
translation.es: La verdad, no creo poderseguir soportando a esa chica.

translation.en: I'mma head back, hang with the others. It's too hot for me.
translation.es: Yo volveré con los otros,hace demasiado calor para mí.
Soy Eagle Scout, no puedo mentir.

translation.en: Yeah, well, thanks for not making me do the same.
translation.es: Gracias por evitarme a mí decirlo.

translation.en: -Where do you want to go? -Let's go that way.
is we don't know that aliens didn't drop us here just to harvest our organs.
translation.es: ...quizá los extraterrestres nos trajeronaquí para sacarnos los órganos.

translation.en: Does anyone have any visible injuries or pain?

translation.es: No. No es amnesia por trauma, entonces.

translation.en: you want to sit with us?
I vaguely remember having a strong dislike for optimists.
translation.es: Recuerdo vagamentesentir aversión por los optimistas.

translation.en: How about I say a word, and then you all say the first thing that comes to mind?
translation.es: ¿Qué tal si digo una palabray dicen lo primero en que piensen?
Dos son más fuertes que uno.

translation.en: Come on! Why'd you start with food? I'm starving.
Let's just crack open some coconuts over there.
What do you think about all those people?
Hmm, checking each other out, trying to mate based on sexual attraction.
translation.es: Se echan el ojo, buscan aparearseen base a la atracción sexual.

translation.en: And me, an intellectual, silently judging them.
translation.es: Y yo, que soy intelectual,los juzgo en silencio.

translation.en: You kinda don't say anything at all.
We should be careful about spending too much time in the sun.
translation.es: Deberíamos cuidarnosde no pasar mucho tiempo al sol.

translation.en: I haven't seen a single plane since we woke up here, -so good luck with that. -What?
translation.es: No vi pasar ni un solo avióndesde que despertamos, pero suerte.

translation.en: I just wanna spend the rest of my days on this deserted island in peace,
translation.es: Solo quiero pasar el resto de mis díasen esta isla desierta en paz,

translation.en: Flirting with each other somewhere. Who cares?
-Let's go swimming. -I'm not moping, I'm tanning.
translation.es: - Vayamos a nadar.- No lloro, me bronceo.

translation.en: Come to help you guys. -[Cooper panting]

translation.es: Vine a ayudarlos. ¿Qué puedo hacer? - Miren quién volvió.- ¡A nadar, perdedores!

translation.en: Come on, you losers! Let's go swimming!
We're in paradise. Let's live a little.
translation.es: Esto es el paraíso, vivamos un poco.

translation.en: [Donovan] Watch out, I'm gonna get you!
I'm gonna stay here and finish this, I think. I don't know if I can swim.
translation.es: Yo me quedaré a terminar esto,no sé si sé nadar.

translation.en: ♪ All the guys All around the world'll say it ♪
Well, at least now we have some fresh water.
-We could probably live here if we had to. -Yeah, we could.
translation.es: Podríamos vivir aquí de ser necesario. Sí, podríamos.

translation.en: Maybe we shouldn't tell the others about this.
translation.es: Tal vez no debamos contarlesa los demás.

translation.en: I just think it should be our little secret for now.
translation.es: Creo que debería sernuestro secreto por ahora.

translation.en: You know, great minds and all that.
So it's the whole survival of the fittest kinda thing, huh?
translation.es: Es la supervivencia del más fuerte, ¿no?

translation.en: Well, I mean, you are pretty fit.
translation.es: Bueno, tú te ves bastante fuerte.

translation.en: Come on! Hey! I said no.
-[Hayden] What? Guys, get out! -[Taylor] Help! Somebody, help! Help!
-Come on! I need a hand! -Hey! Help her!
-Fuck! -[Cooper] Hey, come back to the beach!
[Hayden] No, hey. Mason, are you okay?
What was it? What was it?
[Hayden] You okay? What the fuck happened?
What's up? [Brody] Why's everybody so quiet?
The guy with the long hair.
He went out swimming, so we all joined him, you know, just for some fun.
translation.es: Fue a nadar, y nos metimos con élpara divertirnos un rato.

translation.en: A shark or a fucking who knows what.
translation.es: Un tiburón o quién mierda sabe qué.

translation.en: Where'd you get all that stuff?
Chase isn't a bitch, she's just--
translation.es: Chase no es una perra. Ella...

translation.en: She just happens to find all that survival gear?
translation.es: ¿Justo fue a encontraresos elementos de supervivencia?

translation.en: Y'all know what I'm talking about.
She just starts digging around in the sand, where we all woke up?
translation.es: ¿Empieza a cavar en la arena,justo donde nos despertamos?

translation.en: "Oh, look, here's a shell." "Oh, cool. Here's a first aid kit."
translation.es: "Miren, una concha de mar.Genial, un botiquín".

translation.en: -Shit doesn't just happen. -So what are you saying?
translation.es: Nada ocurre por casualidad. ¿Qué quieres decir?

translation.en: Where is she, by the way?
We split up, looking for stuff, like food and whatever.
translation.es: Nos separamos para buscarcomida y esas cosas.

translation.en: I thought she'd be back here before me.
translation.es: Creí que volvería antes que yo.

translation.en: You know what, why don't we move down there, behind the rocks?
translation.es: ¿Por qué no vamos para allá,detrás de las rocas?

translation.en: There's less wind, and we can build a real fire.
translation.es: Hay menos viento,haremos una fogata de verdad.

translation.en: The smoke can be a signal to people.
translation.es: El humo podría servir de señal...

translation.en: -Like a boat or a plane or something. -Who?
Why don't you grab this stuff, and we'll all go.
[Blair scoffs] Why? Who said he's the leader?
You collect the coconuts, all right?
You seem pretty good with the hatchet. Maybe we can use that to...
translation.es: Pareces manejar bien el hacha.Podríamos usarla para...

translation.en: You two, if you guys carry on collecting the firewood...
translation.es: Ustedes dos podrían seguir juntando leños...

translation.en: I just-- I think it's better if we work together as a team.
translation.es: Creo que sería mejorque trabajemos todos en equipo.

translation.en: Don't you fucking ever touch me again!
-You hear me? Don't you fucking ever-- -[Brody groans]
Don't you ever touch me again, or anybody here, do you hear me?
translation.es: ¡No vuelvas a tocarme a míni a nadie! ¿Me oíste?

translation.en: Did you tell 'em about the waterfall?
-[Cooper] What waterfall? -All the things that we found? Did you?
translation.es: - ¿Qué cascada?- ¿Y todo lo que encontramos? ¿Les contaste? ¿Les contó?

translation.en: Fresh water. A place to live.
translation.es: Agua dulce, un lugar para vivir...

translation.en: But he wanted to call it our little secret.
translation.es: Pero él quería que fuera nuestro secreto,

translation.en: At least that's what he said before he attacked me.
translation.es: eso fue lo que dijo antes de atacarme.

translation.en: -Attacked you? -[Chase] Yes, attacked me, you liar!
She's the one who came on to me.
translation.es: Ella fue la que me buscó.

translation.en: So maybe you should think about what's important here.
translation.es: Tal vez deberías pensaren las prioridades.

translation.en: would you stop by and pick fruit for everyone straight after?
translation.es: ¿irían como si nadaa recoger frutas para todos?

translation.en: Or would you, uh, go straight back to wherever and do something about it?
translation.es: ¿O volverían enseguidapara hacer algo al respecto?

translation.en: [chuckles] Oh! "Hey, got some bananas and mangoes,
and by the way, this guy over here, he attacked me."
translation.es: Y, por cierto, ese tipo de ahí me atacó".

translation.en: -I mean, that's insane talk! -You fucking attacked me!
translation.es: ¡Eso sí que es absurdo! ¡Me atacaste, basura!

translation.en: Don't touch me! Any of you!

translation.es: Nada. Nos besamos, eso es todo.

translation.en: [Hayden] This is crazy, right? All this?
I don't know. I have a bad feeling about this.
translation.es: No lo sé. Tengo un mal presentimiento.

translation.en: -Stay with us, all right? -Shit! That's unreal!
He just grabbed me. Come on. Can you hear me?
[Cooper] The shark tore him up good.
Okay, we need to get the first aid kit. Somebody needs to go now--
translation.es: Necesitamos el botiquín. - Que alguien lo traiga.- ¿Es en serio?
- Que alguien lo traiga.- ¿Es en serio?

translation.en: It probably has Spider-Man Band-Aids. That's not gonna do anything.
translation.es: Debe haber curitas del Hombre Araña,no servirá de nada.

translation.en: Here, I'll help you with his leg.
-[Donovan wails in pain] -[Hayden] I'll get the kit.
translation.es: - Traeré el botiquín.- Necesita un torniquete.

translation.en: -Put on a tourniquet. -[Chase] Let me help you.
translation.es: - Traeré el botiquín.- Necesita un torniquete. Te ayudaré.

translation.en: Isn't that the guy that pushed you in front of the shark?
-I don't know what to do. -We need to get him back.
translation.es: ¿Qué hacemos? No sé qué hacer. Vamos a llevarlo allá, ¿sí?Agárrenlo todos de abajo.

translation.en: Okay, so I need everybody to get underneath him.
translation.es: Vamos a llevarlo allá, ¿sí?Agárrenlo todos de abajo.

translation.en: [Blair] Please, someone else can-- Taylor, can you come over here, please?
translation.es: Por favor, alguien... Taylor, ¿puedes venir aquí?

translation.en: [Chase] Get him back to the fire so he can stay warm.
Okay, so I'm gonna tell you when to lift him.
-We need to keep the wound raised. -[Cooper] Okay.
translation.es: Hay que mantener la herida elevada.

translation.en: Two... Lift him really, really slowly and steadily, okay?
translation.es: Dos... Levántenlo bien despacioy con firmeza, ¿sí?

translation.en: [Blair] It's okay. It's okay. It's not long now.
translation.es: No te preocupes, ya casi llegamos.

translation.en: Come on. Guys, fucking move it!
For what you did or lying about it?
more of a general type of thing.
I mean, it doesn't matter, but people are gonna...
translation.es: Digo, no importa, pero los demás...

translation.en: Things are gonna get a lot worse out here before they get any better.
translation.es: Las cosas empeorarán muchoantes de mejorar.

translation.en: You're smart, I know you can see that.
We don't even know what's going on.
We don't have a clue how we woke up here.
translation.es: no sabemos por qué despertamos aquí.

translation.en: I just think that people need to...
end up on the right side with each other before it's too late.
translation.es: ...llevarnos bien antes de que sea tarde.

translation.en: Before things start to go down or fall apart.
translation.es: Antes de que todo empiece a desmoronarse.

translation.en: Look, that's all I wanted to say.
translation.es: Es todo lo que quería decir.

translation.en: So, you just want me to forget the fact that you just jumped on me,
translation.es: ¿Quieres que olvideque te abalanzaste sobre mí,

translation.en: held me down, and all that?
translation.es: que me retuviste y todo eso?

translation.en: Why? Because it's-- it's gonna get worse for me?
How much worse for me is it gonna get?
the rest of them, they, uh...
So I told them that I'd come over here and tell you.
translation.es: Les dije que vendría a avisarte.

translation.en: I hope you can join us.

translation.es: Ya veremos. Ojalá, me vendría bien tu voto.
Ojalá, me vendría bien tu voto.

translation.en: Yeah, I got a couple ideas.
I'm sure the folks are gonna wanna put things to a vote at some point.
translation.es: Seguramente, en algún momento,querrán hacer una votación.

translation.en: You know, I don't need you.
You know that, right? I was just being nice.
translation.es: Lo sabes, ¿no? Solo estaba siendo amable.

translation.en: And they're also kinda worried about that, um...
Why don't you tell them that I'm holding it just in case you try to rape me again, you fucker?
translation.es: Diles que los tengopor si intentas violarme otra vez, basura.

translation.en: And we all know what happens to him, don't we?
I wasn't trying to rape you.
There's no such thing like that in a place like this.
translation.es: No existe eso en un lugar como este.

translation.en: There's just sex and no sex.
translation.es: Aquí hay sexo o no hay sexo.

translation.en: I know it's a risk, but I think it's a risk worth taking.
translation.es: Es un riesgo, pero vale la pena correrlo.

translation.en: Especially because we got someone who's injured.
translation.es: Sobre todo porque tenemos un herido.

translation.en: I don't think we should move him.
Didn't know whether I should be here or not, but then I figured, hey,
translation.es: No sabía si debía venir o no,pero luego pensé...

translation.en: you guys are all that I have, so, let this big council meeting begin.
translation.es: ...que son todo lo que tengo,así que comencemos la reunión.

translation.en: We don't know why and we don't know how, but it's real.
translation.es: No sabemos cómo ni por qué,pero es la realidad.

translation.en: We can get sunburned or killed by shit in the water.
translation.es: Podemos insolarnoso ser atacados en el agua.

translation.en: And we're gonna get hungry and thirsty.
All I'm proposing is that we all take a vote
translation.es: Lo que propongo es que votemos

translation.en: to move off the beach to a little spot inland,
translation.es: para trasladarnosa un lugar tierra adentro,

translation.en: where we have fresh water, shelter, and we're protected.
translation.es: donde tenemos agua, refugioy estaremos protegidos.

translation.en: And where no one knows where we're at.
translation.es: Y donde nadie sabrá que estamos.

translation.en: Face facts. We're out here on our own.
We have to have hope, right?
without any shelter, out in the open.

translation.es: ...por el clima, los animaleso alguna infección.

translation.en: I'll tell you what, I promise you this, we haven't seen half the shit this island's gonna throw at us.
translation.es: Les diré algo, esto no es ni la mitadde lo que nos espera en esta isla.

translation.en: That's a fact. We have to be ready.
translation.es: Es un hecho. Debemos estar preparados.

translation.en: -[chuckles] Wow. -We need to keep this fire going,
translation.es: - Vaya.- Hay que mantener el fuego.

translation.en: take turns searching for food, getting water,
translation.es: Nos turnaremos para buscar comida y agua,

translation.en: building a hut or two, and we survive.
translation.es: construiremos una choza o dosy sobreviviremos.
- Es lo que pienso.- O intentamos irnos de aquí.

translation.en: -Or we try to get out of here. -What are you gonna use for a boat?
translation.es: - Es lo que pienso.- O intentamos irnos de aquí. ¿Qué usarás como bote?

translation.en: First aid kit, or... maybe that cute little knife you got in your belt?
translation.es: ¿El botiquín de primeros auxilioso ese lindo cuchillo que tienes ahí?

translation.en: Why don't you try listening for once?
Do you have a piece of info that we don't have?
Why the hell would you say, "Get outta here"?
translation.es: ¿Por qué hablas de irnos de aquí?

translation.en: Do you guys know these two here?
[Chase] This guy over here and this girl?
This is Mason and that's Hayden.
translation.es: Él es Mason, y ella es Hayden.

translation.en: I saw them earlier, moving along the beach, in an odd way,
translation.es: Los vi antes caminando por la playade forma extraña,

translation.en: like if they were counting steps or something.
translation.es: como si estuvieran contando pasos o algo.

translation.en: -There's more to it, wasn't there? -Probably dumb, just forget it.
translation.es: - Y había algo más.- Es una tontería, olvídenlo.

translation.en: It was the number of steps...
between each of us. That's what we noticed. They were equidistant, all of them.
translation.es: ...que había entre cada uno de nosotros.Estábamos equidistantes.

translation.en: When I kept finding things buried in the sand,
translation.es: Así fui encontrandolas cosas enterradas en la arena,

translation.en: first there was one, and then there was another.
I mean, the rest I guessed, but they were all there.
translation.es: El resto lo supuse,pero estaban todas ahí.

translation.en: It was 39 steps between each of us, without fail.
translation.es: Había 39 pasos entre cada unode nosotros, sin excepción.
Treinta y nueve de mis pasos.

translation.en: I tried to be as even as possible because it's not an exact unit of measurement, but...
translation.es: Traté de ser lo más preciso posibleporque no es una unidad de medida exacta,

translation.en: Isn't that a movie or something? 39 Steps?
That probably doesn't have anything to do with this.
translation.es: No debe tener nada que ver con esto.

translation.en: We have to be open to what's around us.
translation.es: Tenemos que estar atentosa lo que nos rodea,

translation.en: Try to remember things of our lives that would help us figure out what the hell all this means.
translation.es: tratar de recordar cosas de nuestras vidasque nos ayuden a descifrar esto.

translation.en: It could be something, it could be nothing,
translation.es: Podría ser algo o no ser nada,

translation.en: We calculated the number of steps we had times the number of people that existed here.
translation.es: Multiplicamos la cantidad de pasospor la cantidad de personas que había.

translation.en: And then we followed that number.
Yeah, since when did this become a math problem?
translation.es: Sí, ¿desde cuándo estoes un problema matemático?

translation.en: There's a guy dying over there.
Can we please, please take a vote?
translation.es: ¿Podríamos votar de una vez, por favor?

translation.en: since it would be impossible to go out there and calculate steps in a credible way while swimming and--
translation.es: ya que sería imposible metersey calcular los pasos de forma fiable...

translation.en: -And not counting the shark. -Right, and not counting the shark,
translation.es: - Sin contar los tiburones.- Claro. Sin contar los tiburones.

translation.en: we began taking a series of random samplings
translation.es: Hicimos una serie de muestreos aleatorios

translation.en: in terms of jungle and also in both directions on the beach,
translation.es: que abarcan la junglay la playa en ambas direcciones,
y eso nos da una variable de tamaño

translation.en: based on the biggest and smallest of us,
translation.es: basada en los más altosy más bajos de nosotros.

translation.en: eight. I just want to be sure. [Hayden] I'm counting, too.
translation.es: - ...ocho. Quiero estar seguro.- Yo también cuento.

translation.en: [Chase] I really don't know if it was a good idea to leave him behind.
translation.es: No sé si fue buena idea dejarlo solo.

translation.en: I was down this beach earlier, and I didn't even see it.
translation.es: Yo pasé por aquí antes y ni lo vi.

translation.en: I mean, not that I was looking for it, but there it is, in plain English.
translation.es: No lo estaba buscando,pero aquí está, en letras claras.

translation.en: Yeah, it's a sign that's exactly the same amount of steps
translation.es: Sí, un letrero ubicado exactamentea una cierta cantidad de pasos

translation.en: as it is from the people that woke up on this island.
translation.es: de todos los que despertamos en esta isla.

translation.en: It says, "Find your way back." Yep. Right there.
translation.es: - Dice: "Encuentra cómo regresar".- Sí, ahí está.

translation.en: You know, this is actually bad news,
translation.es: Y son malas noticias, de hecho.

translation.en: 'cause whoever made this sign is gone,
translation.es: Porque quien haya hecho estono está aquí,

translation.en: so they either figured something out or...
translation.es: Porque quien haya hecho estono está aquí, así que descubrió algo o...

translation.en: It's not like it's magic. It's not even math.
translation.es: No es magia. Ni siquiera es matemática.

translation.en: They just walked down the beach and found it.
If they hadn't, someone else would've.
translation.es: De no ser así, lo habría encontrado otro.

translation.en: Hey, it's cool, it's just not-- not a grocery store or ice cream.
translation.es: Es genial, pero no es una tiendade comestibles ni un helado.

translation.en: We're hungry, and it's not even a map that tells us where we are.
translation.es: Tenemos hambre, y ni siquiera esun mapa que diga dónde estamos.

translation.en: How do you know that that's not what this is?
-No, honestly, how do you know? -It's not. Look, it's a sign.
translation.es: - En serio, ¿cómo lo sabes?- Es un letrero...

translation.en: It's-- It's something. I know it is.
translation.es: Es algo, sé que lo es.

translation.en: I should go check on Donovan.
translation.es: Debo ir a ver cómo está Donovan.

translation.en: Does it say "find your way home"?
translation.es: No dice "encuentra cómo regresar a casa",solo "regresar".
No dice "encuentra cómo regresar a casa",solo "regresar". A algún lado.

translation.en: -I just don't know where "where" is. -[Hayden] Who knows?
translation.es: - Solo que no sé adónde.- ¿Quién sabe?

translation.en: Maybe they're right. It means nothing. [Mason] But the numbers are correct.
translation.es: - Quizá tengan razón y no signifique nada.- Pero los números coinciden.

translation.en: It could just be a sign.
An actual sign, left here by someone a long time ago
translation.es: Solo un letrero que alguien dejóhace mucho tiempo
sobre algo que no significa nada.

translation.en: [Mason] Do you think the numbers are just all chance?
